alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phelps, northwestern Kearney, Buffalo, southeastern Gosper, southeastern Dawson, Furnas and northern Harlan Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Amherst to near Holdrege to near Atlanta to near Edison. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Amherst around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Miller, Odessa and Elm Creek. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 254 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps
